title: Welcome to My Website
text:
I created this website to bring together all the facets of my personality and work in one place. It‚Äôs a reflection of my journey, my ambitions, and a way to connect with others. Whether you‚Äôre here to collaborate, learn, or simply browse, I hope this space inspires and informs you.
Feel free to explore and enjoy your stay!

title: About Me
text:
My Football Journey
Football has been a central part of my life ever since I kicked my first ball as a child. Over the years, I‚Äôve played for local clubs, school teams, and the national team. It‚Äôs not just a sport for me‚Äîit‚Äôs a way to challenge myself, build friendships, and express my passion for teamwork and strategy.

Favorite Position: Centre Midfield
Memorable Moment: Scoring the winning goal in a championship match.
Favorite Teams: Manchester United

title: About Me
text:
My Family
Family is the cornerstone of my life. They‚Äôve supported me in every step of my journey‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs cheering me on at football matches or helping me achieve my academic and personal goals.

I have 2 siblings, and we love spending time together.
My parents are my greatest inspiration, teaching me the values of hard work, perseverance, and kindness.
Our favorite family activity? Going out for a nice meal as a family.




The Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT) is Singapore‚Äôs first University of Applied Learning and the third largest university by intake in Singapore. SIT‚Äôs mission is to maximise the potential of our learners and to innovate with industry, through an integrated applied learning and research approach, so as to contribute to the economy and society.

title: About Me
text:
My School Life
Education has played a crucial role in shaping who I am today. My school years were filled with both academic challenges and exciting extracurricular activities.
School taught me the value of discipline, teamwork, and time management‚Äîskills that have been invaluable both on and off the field.

title: About Me
text:
I started playing football at the age of 6.
My dream is to watch the FIFA World Cup live one day.
I once scored a hat-trick in a friendly match with my friends!


Thank you for reading more about me! Head back to the Home page to explore more or check out my Reflections on life and football.

title: Reflections
text:
Here is my reflection on Generative AI
Generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) has revolutionized the field by providing effective tools for efficiency, creativity, and problem-solving. It enables users to approach jobs more precisely, streamlining intricate operations and creating opportunities for creativity. To guarantee responsible application, its use necessitates careful consideration. GenAI promotes a mutually beneficial interaction between people and technology, in which AI enhances rather than replaces human innovation.
However, its over-reliance could inhibit creative thinking, which would raise questions about ethics and authenticity. Transparency in its uses, especially in writing, design, and education, requires careful thought.
